title: That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report CAOPC24-008, dated June 17, 2024 of the Chief Administrative Officer as follows. That the Minutes of Settlement between the City and CUPE 126 dated June 3, 2024 that sets out new terms for a Collective Agreement covering the three-year period January 1, 2024 to December 31, 2026, be approved.

That the following by-laws be approved: 24-045 Being a By-law to establish Tax Ratios for prescribed property classes for the 2024 taxation year 24-046 Being a By-law to levy and collect taxes for municipal, education and business improvement area purposes for the year 2024, to impose a penalty charge for non-payment of 2024 taxes, to provide for interest to be added to tax arrears, to establish that the City of Peterborough has now exited the Capping program for the Commercial, Industrial and Multi-Residential classes.
That By-law 24-047, Being a By-law to confirm the proceedings of the Council at its meeting held on June 17, 2024, be approved.
That this meeting be adjourned at 9:49 p.m.
